name: Puzzle Car
description:
A minimalist and relaxing experience. Challenge yourself to move pieces to assemble a safe path for your car and collect all the items on the way, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack in a totally minimalist environment. In this game, create a safe path using curves, intersections, tunnels and collect all the items on the way, always respecting crosswalks. Have fun!



Features
• 50 challenges.
• Calm and relaxing soundtrack.
• Satisfactory sound effect.
• Unique puzzles.
• Simple and minimalist puzzle game.
